name: Jedi Lightsaber (V)
Lore: 'Elegant sword of pure energy. ''This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster. A lightsaber can be dangerous to an unskilled user.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Mace or Yoda. [Coruscant] sites may not cancel Force drain bonuses. May add 1 to a Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw 2 destiny (3 if on Yoda and defending). Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.(Original concept by Brandon Ruck - Tennessee State Winner 2004)',
